tags.name: AbstractedPipeline
tags.description: PIpeline logic is decoupled from input data source schema by mapping into Instances first.

pipelines.name: motorXxxServiceRecords_api
pipelines.description: Request motor asset telemetry and last service records. Format request body as {"assetId":"001"} where the assetId value can range from "001" and above.

pipelines.name: motorXxxServiceRecords_event
pipelines.description: Request motor asset telemetry and last service records. Format request body as {"assetId":"001"} where the assetId value can range from "001" and above.

pipelines.name: motorXxxServiceRecords_template
pipelines.description: Request motor asset telemetry and last service records. Format request body as {"assetId":"001"} where the assetId value can range from "001" and above.
